sentences.en: A tattered flag hung from the roof of the burnt - out building.
sentences.cn: 一面破旗挂在 烧毀 的建筑物房顶上.

sentences.en: A tattered lace handkerchief twitched in her fingers.
sentences.cn: 她的指间绕着一块破烂的花边手帕.

sentences.en: He fled wearing only a sarong and a tattered shirt.
sentences.cn: 他逃走时只穿着莎笼和破旧的衬衫。

sentences.en: He produced a tattered envelope from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出一个破烂的信封。

sentences.en: He stooped a little, and with his tattered blue cap pointed under the carriage.
sentences.cn: 他略微躬了躬身子, 用他那蓝色的破帽指了指车下.

sentences.en: He then waved the tattered ensign above his head.
sentences.cn: 然后,他将那面支离破碎的旗子高高举过头顶挥舞起来.

sentences.en: He was much thinner and his tattered trousers were as filthy as could be.
sentences.cn: 身上瘦了许多,那条破裤已经脏得不能再脏.

sentences.en: He was wearing a tattered coat.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件破烂的外套.

sentences.en: He wore a tattered coat with holes in the elbows.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件破旧的上衣,肘部已经磨穿.

sentences.en: I do not like ruined, tattered cottages.
sentences.cn: 我不喜爱坍圮 、 破烂的别墅.

sentences.en: Once across the Berezina, the tattered survivors limped toward Vilna.
sentences.cn: 渡过别列兹拿河, 溃不成军的幸存者一瘸一拐地向维尔纽行进.

sentences.en: Their tattered clothing and broken furniture indicated their poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们褴褛的衣服和破烂的家具显出他们的贫穷.

sentences.en: They were laughing at his long beard and his tattered clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们笑他的长胡须和破衣裳.

sentences.en: What harm is there if thy clothes become tattered and stained?
sentences.cn: 你的衣服污损了又何妨 呢 ?

sentences.en: When he thinks of the tattered soldier he recalls his cowardice.
sentences.cn: 想起那个褴褛兵,他立即联想到自己的懦弱.

trans.tran_en: clothes, books etc that are tattered are old and torn

trans.tran_cn: 扯碎，撕碎( tatter的过去式和过去分词)
